body: Eun Ho is an ass.  He is a privileged shit.  I have sympathy for the teacher though he was an adult and she was a kid and it is his job as a teacher to have appropriate boundaries to protect himself and training protect messed up kids like from creating chaos like she did.
This may just be the most best and sadest hentai i ever read i feel bad for the teacher
